transArray.content: The check-in experience was very good and the service was in place.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your positive recognition of our room! Every city always has reasons for people to miss it, and every season has scenery that makes it hard for us to leave. Our hotel is an 8-10 minute walk away from Shaoyaoju Metro Line 10 and Line 13, making it the best choice for your trip. Oh, I hope that Orange Beijing Shaoyaoju University of International Business and Economics Hotel will be the warmest and unique existence in your memories! We look forward to your visit every time and wish you success in your work!
